Class SeedUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carrotsearch.randomizedtesting.SeedUtils

  • public final class SeedUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for parsing random seeds.

        public static long parseSeed(java.lang.String seed)
